fields.fieldTitle: What's a "secret" term/topic your target audience may not know?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience really doesn't understand (term / topic) ________." (1-3 words)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: funnel hacking; online house flipping; multimodal attention enhancement techniques; relationship regeneration; ketosis; apple stem cell technology, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is their main area of focus here in 2-3 words?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience's main focus here is in the area of ________." (2-3 words)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: online marketing; real estate investing; ADHD problems; marital happiness; weight loss; youthful appearance, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 big, huge result they desire most in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience really wants to ________." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: create a 7-figure funnel; make a quick 10K this weekend by flipping houses on eBay; naturally destroy your kid's ADHD; reconnect with your wife; lose weight without exercising; get rid of fine lines and wrinkles, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #1 obvious (NEGATIVE) thing everyone knows here?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: you won't make money if you're not selling online; you can't make money if you don't invest; you should never say anything to your child that hurts their self esteem; you should never yell at your wife, ever; refined sugar and carbs are bad for us; you should never use harsh chemicals on your skin, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #1 typical solution everyone tries in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "Even though everyone tells you ______ is the solution here, it's NOT!" (VERB ending in "ING")

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: struggling with a wordpress website; flipping houses locally; getting your kid to "settle down" and pay attention; talking more; dieting and restricting carbs; getting Botox injections, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the "secret action" they need to take to get results?

fieldHint.hint1: "The REAL secret to success here is ______!" (VERB ending in "ING")

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: setting up a real marketing funnel; finding houses online you can flip quickly; helping your child find his strengths and capitalize on those; opening meaningful lines of communication; getting your body into ketosis; using innovative apple stem cell technology, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's something they know they should STOP doing?

fieldHint.hint1: "You know you should stop ______, but it's hard!" (VERB ending in "ING"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: trying to set everything up yourself; trying to find investment houses through a local realtor; feeling frustrated about your child's ADHD; arguing with your wife; eating carbs; using cheap cosmetics, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What action counteracts what they know they should stop doing?

fieldHint.hint1: "It's not a huge deal (above) as long as you are also ______!" (VERB ending in "ING")

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: automating the entire funnel process; using internet search tools to find investment properties anywhere in the country; encouraging your child and celebrating small, incremental gains; avoiding personal attacks during your arguments; drinking ketones; saving your skin with a proven skin cream that works "from the inside out", etc.
